full_text: All around I can say 2020 hasn't been that bad for me. I graduated, got a job, and didn't get COVID. The year not over yet but it's been an okay year.

I also want to mention that I LITERALLY ONLY ordered food online ONE TIME for all of 10 month lockdown. I definitely MISSED my calling. Had I done it once a month I might could've made it to the finish line, right?
